text:
Население:

На этой странице должны выводиться новые варианты ответа в зависимости от числа жителей в убежище

answers.lua_if:
function lua_if()
if vars["human".. 1<plus>vars.k_num .."_have"] == 1 then
vars["human".. 1 .."_desc"] = "№".. 1<plus>vars.k_num .." ".. vars["human"..1<plus>vars.k_num.."_name"] .." ".. vars["human".. 1<plus>vars.k_num .."_surname"]
return true
end
end

answers.lua_do:
function lua_do()
local created = 0
  for i=1,100 do
    if vars["human".. i .."_have"] == 0 and created == 0 then
      local gender = math.random(1,2)
      if gender == 1 then gender = "мужской"
      else gender = "женский"
      end
      if gender == "мужской" then
      vars["human".. i .."_name"] = vars.male_names[math.random(1,#vars.male_names)]
      vars["human".. i .."_surname"] = vars.male_surnames[math.random(1,#vars.male_surnames)]
      else vars["human".. i .."_name"] = vars.female_names[math.random(1,#vars.female_names)]
        vars["human".. i .."_surname"] = vars.female_surnames[math.random(1,#vars.female_surnames)]
      end
      vars["human".. i .."_gender"] = gender
      vars["human".. i .."_have"] = 1
      created = 1
    end
  end
end

function lua_do()
vars.human_info = "ID: ".. vars.look_num .."<s>
".." Полное имя: ".. vars["human".. vars.look_num .."_name"] .." ".. vars["human".. vars.look_num .."_surname"] .."<s>
".." Пол: ".. vars["human".. vars.look_num .."_gender"]
end
